title: G-STAR Men's 3301 Straight Tapered Fit Jeans
description: The G-Star 3301 Straight Tapered Fit Jeans feature a classic 5-pocket construction inspired by authentic Western denim, updated with a modern tapered leg.
Straight Tapered Fit: Regular rise, straight through thigh and narrows from knee to hem.
Constructed from our Elto Black Stretch Denim, a 10.2oz denim partially made from recycled and renewable resources. Superb stretch and excellent recovery for added comfort and movement.
The G-Star 3301 Straight Tapered Jeans feature a classic 5-pocket construction inspired by authentic Western jeans
